herotitle: From Turkey to Your Home — Simple and Fast!
herotext: We help facilitate the purchase of warehouses, from viewing to receiving the keys and the full package of documents.
abouttext: We help facilitate the purchase of warehouses, from viewing to receiving the keys and the full package of documents.
processregister: Register and get your shipping address in Turkey.
processbuy: Shop online and use your shipping address.
processsend: Receive your parcel within 5-10 business days.
advantdescr0: Our innovative service center technology allows you to receive parcels via barcode in just 10 seconds. We value your time!
advantdescr1: Once your parcel arrives at our warehouses in the USA and China, it will be sent to Uzbekistan within 24 hours.
advantdescr2: Delivery in Tashkent - $2. Delivery across Uzbekistan - $5.
advantdescr3: You always pay for the actual weight, significantly saving on shipping costs.
advantdescr4: CARGO provides 0% sales tax. Our warehouse is located in Delaware, allowing you to avoid extra tax payments.
advantdescr5: Strong locking devices that can hold up to 4 locks.
advantdescr6: Strong locking devices that can hold up to 4 locks.
storedescr: Here you will find a wide selection of vitamins, supplements, and health care products.
bestStoreModalText: We are a team of professionals and specialists who work with all types of cargo and organize deliveries from any point in the world under various customs conditions.
bestStoreModalText2: Our company always strives to guarantee delivery deadlines. Our established operations help reduce waiting times for shared cargo, which speeds up delivery.
